did.unittitle: Thomas J. Mooney Application for a Writ of Habeas Corpus, 1938
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of three court documents relating to Thomas J. Mooney's application for a Writ of Habeas Corpus before the Supreme Court of the State of California, 1938.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Thomas J. Mooney Application for a Writ of Habeas Corpus #5346. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
